topics.body:
"@Dashu":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5580474763687205b500021f#post_5580474763687205b500021f
The Heisei era shows have no continuity with each other, And Showa has very little. (The guy who gives them their motorcycles And the endgame crossovers is about it.)

"I would recommend these guys for acquiring them":http://krdl.info/ (Don't use TVN subs unless you have no choice)

Also, You might need the CCCP and a video player that works with it.
